description.narrative: Expansion of IT Infrastructure: Turkey''s DC sector options are limited in terms of quality, neutrality and scale. By bringing a Tier 3+ DC of this size to market, this Project shall address a pressing need for quality IT infrastructure and services. Private Sector Development: Zenium will provide companies with access to a high quality, secure, resilient, earthquake resistant Tier 3+ DC facility that can host mission-critical, low latency, high-performance type applications that need to connect to applications of other accounts or other networks. The outsourcing of DC services will enable its tenants (governments, financial institutions and other enterprises) to benefit from these services in a cost effective manner without tying up capital for the construction of a non-core asset, freeing up capital for use in other areas. Demonstration Effect: The success of this Project will act as a catalyst for further expansion of advanced DC offerings in Turkey by highlighting their potential to both domestic and international investors.

The proposed project consists of the development, construction and operation of a 12,000 m2 data center in Istanbul and potentially a second facility in Ankara, Turkey. Built to top tier industry standards the two facilities shall be the first wholesale independent data centers in Turkey and will host Information Communications and Technology (ICT) infrastructure for mission critical applications, as well as provide off-site back-up of client data and systems. Operating as carrier neutral data centers, these facilities will allow commercial clients to locate their ICT equipment in secure bespoke data halls, provide access to a stable power supply and offer connectivity alternatives with a host of data carriers (such as telecommunications operators and internet service providers), all whilst guaranteeing seamless, reliable service.
